description.english: You completed the OBEY tutorial, are you ready for action?
Crash in a dropship.
You really like laser walls don't you? Place 500 laser walls.
Drop 100 corpses into opponent's feed boxes.
Get DENIED 10 times!
Have a reign Robosaru that lasts less than 1 second.
Get  killed while you were JUST about to subvert!
Shoot a fellow bunny with a pointer.
From the jaws of death you snatched a DOUBLE SUBVERSION!
Win a game without spending any money.
Spend no money in last 5 consecutive rounds won.
You hopped across more than 1000 meters in 1 round. I bet your wittle paws hurt, don't they?
You have hopped across 100,000 meters.  This is actually pretty incredible.  -Dez
Nice Job.  Now, search for collars in the map.

displayName.english: It's the journey, not the destination.

description.english: You have hopped across 10 kilometres.  I'm glad to hear it was all done going to the feed box and back.
You have caused over 10,000 cents of corpse damage to your adversaries!
Place 1st in a tournament.
Place within the top 3 in 5 separate tournaments.
Win as robo without getting corpsed!
Win your first match!
Win as robo for the 15th time!
Win as robo for the 50th time.
Win a match against bots.

displayName.english: Nice dropship, it would be a shame if....

description.english: Be involved in 15 crashes.
Be involved in 5 dropship crashes in 1 round.
Be involved in 100 crashes.
Place 100 laser walls in 1 round.
Deposit a corpse in someone's feedbox.
Cause 100,000 cents of corpse damage overall!
Cause 250,000 cents of corpse damage overall!
Cause 500,000 cents of corpse damage overall!
You earned 1 MILLION cents in OBEY!
Win without being in the robot.
Win by being first in the robot, and never getting subverted.
Deliver 1000 uraniums to the feedbox.
Die by having your collar detonated by the robot.
Put your collar in the feedbox "by accident".
Use laser walls as a corpse factory by dying 10 or more times in 1 round via laser wall.

displayName.english: Yes, Dear Overlord, whatever you say my most Beneficent Leader!

description.english: Deliver 50 or more uranium to the feedbox in 1 round.
Get a bunny to deliver uranium for no autopay.
Deliver uranium to the robot player for free.
Lose to a bot.

displayName.english: Welcome your new robotic robot overlord!

description.english: Get subverted by a bot!
Lose to a player who reached robo at the start of the round, and whom you were never able to dislodge.
You have been killed 1000 times in OBEY!
Get corpsed 10 or more times in one round.
Get corpsed by a bot.
Walk into a laser wall.

displayName.english: It's almost as if they don't want you to get in.

description.english: Get denied 20 times.
Crash with at least 6 bunnies in the dropship!
Fall off the edge of the map into the void.
Die by command line
As a bunny, use the /w command to whisper to another bunny.
Destroy an object by dumping it off the edge of the map.

displayName.english: I am not responsible for what happens next.

description.english: Place a mine right in the drop area.
Corpse a bot.
Be the first bunny in the robot for the match.
Shut down robo's generator by accessing it's green display panel.
Kill 2 bunnies with 1 sentry shot!
Kill 3 bunnies with 1 sentry shot!
Kill 4 bunnies with a single sentry shot!
Subvert robo while wearing a loyalty collar.
Win after being corpsed 5 times or more.
Win after being corpsed 10 times or more.
Get corpsed 20 times or more in 1 round.
Use the /kill command while inside Robosaru.
Drop your own corpse into the feed box.
Corpse robo... with their own corpse!
Kill a bunny with the power plant.
Corpse a player who is already at the minimum score limit.
Clog the MaximumPower generator's exhaust with an item.
Use a battery or uranium to clog the power plant's exhaust, forcing the robot to either destroy the valuable item or leave the power plant off.
Hide a uranium under water.
Kill 2 or more bunnies by turning on the power plant.
Collect money from a player who is already in the negative score
Kill a human opponent with your sentries.
Deposit someone else's hard earned token!
Deposit uranium that you purchased into someone else's feed box!

displayName.english: If I can't have it, no one can!

description.english: Throw an item that you purchased into the void.
Get corpsed with your own corpse.
Get corpsed by someone who used their own corpse!
Complete a blueprint
As robo, fire your sentries, flamer, cannon, and rockets all at once.

displayName.english: I was on my way to church!

description.english: Get thermalized by a laser sentry.
Deposit tiny scrap for maximum autopay!
Die 200 times in OBEY
Corpse an ai robo with the corpse of an ai bot!
Steal another player's autopay!
